dungeon.jp: デグリル&メグリル(7段階)
dungeon.zh: 泰格里尔&梅格里尔(第7阶段)

description.en: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Dek'Ril</color>'s <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description.jp: <color=#28d9ed>【デグリル】</color>の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせ、自分には<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: 使<color=#28d9ed>泰格里尔</color>的<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,并对自身造成<color=#28d9ed>标记</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

description.en:
(Passive Effect)
Increases <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> at the start of battle.

Greatly reduces <color=#28d9ed>all allies'</color> <color=#28d9ed>damage taken</color> while the caster is alive. <color=#28d9ed>Damage Taken</color> Reduction is removed upon caster's death, but grants <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Increased Attack</color> to <color=#28d9ed>Dek'Ril</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr:
(패시브 효과)
전투 입장 시 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 증가합니다.

자신이 생존해 있는 동안, <color=#28d9ed>아군 전체</color>의 <color=#28d9ed>받는 피해</color>가 크게 감소합니다. 자신이 사망 시 <color=#28d9ed>받는 피해</color> 감소 효과는 사라지지만, <color=#28d9ed>데그릴</color>에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>무적</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>공격력 증가</color> 효과를 발생시킵니다.
description.jp:
(パッシブ効果)
戦闘開始時、<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。

自分が戦場にいる間、<color=#28d9ed>味方全体</color>の<color=#28d9ed>受けるダメージ</color>が大幅にDOWNする。自分が倒れた時、<color=#28d9ed>受けるダメージ</color>DOWN効果は消滅するが、<color=#28d9ed>【デグリル】</color>に<color=#28d9ed>無敵</color>と<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力UP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh:
(被动效果)
进入战斗时,使<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

在自身存活期间,使<color=#28d9ed>全体友军</color><color=#28d9ed>所受伤害</color>大幅降低。自身死亡时,<color=#28d9ed>所受伤害</color>降低效果会消失,但会使<color=#28d9ed>泰格里尔</color>获得<color=#28d9ed>无敌</color>和<color=#28d9ed>攻击力提升</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

description.en:
(Passive Effect)
At the start of a turn, if the caster is currently inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>, becomes <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.

Increases damage dealt to non-Fire enemies and reduces damage taken from them.
Reduces damage dealt to Fire enemies and increases damage taken from them.
description.kr:
(패시브 효과)
턴 시작 시 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태라면, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color> 상태가 됩니다.

화속성이 아닌 적에게 입히는 피해가 증가하고, 받는 피해가 감소합니다.
화속성 적에게 입히는 피해가 감소하고, 받는 피해가 증가합니다.
description.jp:
(パッシブ効果)
ターン開始時、<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>状態の場合、<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与される。

火属性以外の敵に与えるダメージがUPし、受けるダメージがDOWNする。
火属性の敵に与えるダメージがDOWNし、受けるダメージがUPする。
description.zh:
(被动效果)
回合开始时,若处于<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>状态,则会陷入<color=#28d9ed>无法恢复</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

对非火属性敌人造成的伤害提升,且所受伤害降低。
对火属性角色造成的伤害降低,且所受伤害提升。
